extracted_playbook.title: Stop and Disconnect ASPECT Products from Internet
extracted_playbook.description: Stop and disconnect any ASPECT products that are exposed directly to the Internet, either via a direct ISP connection or via NAT port forwarding.

extracted_playbook.title: Ensure Physical Security Controls
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure that physical controls are in place, so no unauthorized personnel can access your devices, components, peripheral equipment, and networks.

extracted_playbook.title: Protect Log Files
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure log-files, downloaded from the equipment, are protected against unauthorized access.

extracted_playbook.title: Upgrade ASPECT Products to Latest Firmware
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure that all ASPECT products are upgraded to the latest firmware version. Please find the latest version of ASPECT firmware on the respective product homepage.

extracted_playbook.title: Use Secure Remote Access Methods
extracted_playbook.description: When remote access is required, only use secure methods. If a Virtual Private Network (VPN) is used, ensure that the chosen VPN is secure, updated to the most current version available, and configured for secure access.

extracted_playbook.title: Minimize Network Exposure
extracted_playbook.description: Minimize network exposure for all control system devices and/or systems, ensuring they are not accessible from the Internet.

extracted_playbook.title: Locate Control Systems Behind Firewalls
extracted_playbook.description: Locate control system networks and remote devices behind firewalls and isolate them from business networks.

extracted_playbook.title: Perform Impact Analysis and Risk Assessment
extracted_playbook.description: Perform proper impact analysis and risk assessment prior to deploying defensive measures.

extracted_playbook.title: Report Suspected Malicious Activity to CISA
extracted_playbook.description: Follow established internal procedures and report findings to CISA for tracking and correlation against other incidents.
